Headline: #63W West 63rd Temporary Eastbound Reroute near 63rd/Latrobe
ShortDescription: EB 63W West 63rd buses are temporarily rerouted via 63rd, Central, 65th, & Cicero, due to street blockage near 63rd/Latrobe.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Eastbound #63W West 63rd buses are temporarily rerouted via 63rd, Central, 65th, & Cicero, due to street blockage near 63rd/Latrobe.

Westbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Howard-bound Red Line Delays
ShortDescription: Howard-bound Red Line trains are running w/residual delays following an earlier mechanical problem near Sox-35th. Service resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Howard-bound Red Line trains are running with residual delays and congestion following an earlier mechanical problem near Sox-35th.

Some trains and platforms may be busier than usual as crews work to restore normal service.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.
